original_text: And when they had eaten them up, it could not be known that they had eaten them; but they were still ill favoured, as at the beginning. So I awoke.
korean_text: 먹었으나 먹은 듯 하지 아니하고 여전히 흉하더라 내가 곧 깨었다가

sentences.original_text: And when they had eaten them up
it could not be known that they had eaten them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것을 먹었다는 것을 알 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: but they were still ill favoured
